content.question: Which of the following most likely motivated Parliament to pass the law in the excerpt?

choices.label: The decline of a strong English identity among colonists
The desire to pursue mercantilist goals
The formation of colonial governments that differed from English models
The desire to promote migration to thecolonies

content.answer: The desire to pursue mercantilist goals

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
